mapper.sql: DISPLAY_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, TABLE_NAME, MEMBER_GROUP, GROUP_NUMBER, SEPARATE, CONTROL_STATE, SYSTEM_STATE, ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE, TSC_MODE, PIECE_MODE, TSC_AVAILABLE, PIECE_AVAILABLE, PORT_STATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER (DISPLAY_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, TABLE_NAME, MEMBER_GROUP, GROUP_NUMBER, SEPARATE, CONTROL_STATE, SYSTEM_STATE, ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE, TSC_MODE, PIECE_MODE, TSC_AVAILABLE, PIECE_AVAILABLE, PORT_STATE ) values (#{displayId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{separate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pieceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pieceAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER
DISPLAY_ID,
DISPLAY_NAME,
TABLE_NAME,
MEMBER_GROUP,
GROUP_NUMBER,
SEPARATE,
CONTROL_STATE,
SYSTEM_STATE,
ALARM_STATE,
COMM_STATE,
TSC_MODE,
PIECE_MODE,
TSC_AVAILABLE,
PIECE_AVAILABLE,
PORT_STATE,

mapper.update:
update SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER
DISPLAY_ID = #{record.displayId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_NAME = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_GROUP = #{record.memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_NUMBER = #{record.groupNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEPARATE = #{record.separate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTROL_STATE = #{record.controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_STATE = #{record.systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_STATE = #{record.alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_STATE = #{record.commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_MODE = #{record.tscMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIECE_MODE = #{record.pieceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_AVAILABLE = #{record.tscAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIECE_AVAILABLE = #{record.pieceAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_STATE = #{record.portState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER set DISPLAY_ID = #{record.displayId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_NAME = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_GROUP = #{record.memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_NUMBER = #{record.groupNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEPARATE = #{record.separate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTROL_STATE = #{record.controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_STATE = #{record.systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_STATE = #{record.alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_STATE = #{record.commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_MODE = #{record.tscMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIECE_MODE = #{record.pieceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_AVAILABLE = #{record.tscAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIECE_AVAILABLE = #{record.pieceAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_STATE = #{record.portState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_GROUP = #{memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_NUMBER = #{groupNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEPARATE = #{separate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTROL_STATE = #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_STATE = #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_STATE = #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_STATE = #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_MODE = #{tscMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIECE_MODE = #{pieceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_AVAILABLE = #{tscAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIECE_AVAILABLE = #{pieceAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_STATE = #{portState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DISPLAY_ID = #{displayId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER set DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_GROUP = #{memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_NUMBER = #{groupNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEPARATE = #{separate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTROL_STATE = #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_STATE = #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_STATE = #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_STATE = #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_MODE = #{tscMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIECE_MODE = #{pieceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_AVAILABLE = #{tscAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIECE_AVAILABLE = #{pieceAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_STATE = #{portState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DISPLAY_ID = #{displayId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select SMM.GROUP_NUMBER, SMM.DISPLAY_NAME, SMM.MEMBER_GROUP, (CASE WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'OCDC' THEN 1 WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'STC' THEN 1 WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'XCDC' THEN 1 ELSE 7 END)ICON_TYPE, T.TSC_MODE, T.CONTROL_STATE, T.AVAILABLE, T.ALARM_STATE, T.COMM_STATE, T.SYSTEM_STATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PORT WHERE PORT_ID IN (SELECT PORT_ID FROM PORT WHERE PORT.MANAGEMENT_TSC_ID = SMM.DISPLAY_ID) and AVAILABLE != 'Available') as NOT_AVAILABLE_NUM, (select count(*) from PORT where PORT_ID in (select PORT_ID from PORT WHERE PORT.MANAGEMENT_TSC_ID = SMM.DISPLAY_ID) and AVAILABLE = 'Available') as AVAILABLE_NUM, (select EMPTY_SHELVES FROM STOCKER_ZONE_RLT SZR where SZR.TSC_ID = SMM.DISPLAY_ID and ZONE_ID = 'STORAGE') as ZONE_UTILITY, (select VALUE from MCS_CONSTS where KEY = '${@net.muratec.mcs.common.ComConst$SystemParameter$Key@OCCUPIED_RATE_CAUTION_LEVEL}') as OCCUPIED_CAUTION, (select VALUE from MCS_CONSTS where KEY = '${@net.muratec.mcs.common.ComConst$SystemParameter$Key@OCCUPIED_RATE_ALERT_LEVEL}') as OCCUPIED_ALERT from SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER SMM left outer join TSC T on SMM.DISPLAY_ID = T.TSC_ID
order by SMM.GROUP_NUMBER

select SMM.GROUP_NUMBER, SMM.DISPLAY_NAME, SMM.DISPLAY_ID, SMM.MEMBER_GROUP, (CASE WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'OCDC' THEN 1 WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'STC' THEN 1 WHEN SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = 'XCDC' THEN 1 ELSE 7 END)ICON_TYPE, T.TSC_MODE, T.CONTROL_STATE, T.AVAILABLE, T.ALARM_STATE, T.COMM_STATE, T.SYSTEM_STATE from SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER SMM left outer join TSC T on SMM.DISPLAY_ID = T.TSC_ID where SMM.MEMBER_GROUP = #{memberGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by SMM.GROUP_NUMBER
select rownum, SMM.MEMBER_GROUP from(select distinct MEMBER_GROUP from SCREEN_MONITOR_MEMBER order by MEMBER_GROUP) SMM
